resources.string: Arrow pointing towards the add station symbol
Metadata (Artist / Title) of currently playing radio station

You can add raw audio streams encoded in MP3 and OGG as well as streams encapsulated in pls or m3u files. Alternatively you can add new stations by tapping on streaming links (pls or m3u) in your web browser. Also, the new way to import is by importing a custom list of stations with metadata. sample XML format can be found at https:// Open Quran Radio-open.firebaseapp.com/radios.xml
Station is probably a duplicate or else you might want to check your external storage.
Hint: Open Quran Radio can only process MP3 and OGG encoded streams or URLs ending in .m3u or .pls or .xml.
Open Quran Radio tried hard but could not make sense of given link.
Open Quran Radio tried hard but could not make sense of given file.
Open Quran Radio tried hard but could not save given station to storage.
Unsupported audio format detected. Playback of stream may not work properly.
Unable to rename station. Please choose a different name.
Open Quran Radio does not recognize this station. Please delete and add it again to the Home screen.
Open Quran Radio needs to be granted read permissions to be able access data from external storage.
Unable to change favorit status for station. Please try again later.
Open Quran Radio, is a free radio application contains a lot of quran reciters. It requires internet connection to be able to listen to the stations.
In that version the app contain around 26 stations, in the next versions we will try to increase that number to to include most famous quran reciters ISA.

Open Quran Radio is free software. It is published under the MIT open source license. You can find the code on GitHub. GitHub is also a good place to file bugs or even to contribute, if you are interested.
Which Permissions does Open Quran Radio need?
This permission is needed to install and uninstall radio station shortcuts on the Android Home screen.
Open Quran Radio streams radio stations over the internet.
Open Quran Radio needs access to images, photos and documents to be able to customize radio station icons and to able to open locally saved playlist files.
Tapping and holding a radio station will trigger a tiny vibration.
During Playback Open Quran Radio acquires a so called partial wake lock. That prevents the Android system to stop playback for power saving reasons.
How to use Open Quran Radio
How to add a new radio station?

The easiest way to add a new station is to search the web for streaming links and then choose Open Quran Radio as a your default handler for those file types. You can also tap the (+) symbol in the top bar and paste in streaming links directly. Please note: Open Quran Radio does not feature any kind of built-in search option. Also, the new way to import is by importing a custom list of stations with metadata. sample XML format can be found at https:// Open Quran Radio-open.firebaseapp.com/radios.xml
How to play back a radio station?
Tap the big Stop button or unplug your headphones or swipe off the notification from the lockscreen.
How to start the sleep timer?

Tapping the Clock symbol starts a 15 minute countdown after which Open Quran Radio stops playback. An additional tap adds 15 minutes to the clock. Playback must be running to be able to activate the sleep timer.
How to place a station shortcut on the Home screen?
The option to place a shortcut for a station on the Home screen can be accessed from the station\'s three dots menu. A tap on a shortcut will open Open Quran Radio - playback will start immediately.
How to rename or delete a station?
The rename and delete options can be accessed both from the station\'s context menu.Just tap on the three dots symbol.
Where does Open Quran Radio store its stations?

Open Quran Radio saves its list of stations in a database. and stores stations images files on your device\'s external storage. The files are stored in /Android/data/{{Application-Name}}/files/Collection.
How do I backup and transfer my radio stations?

Open Quran Radio has support for the Auto Backup feature in Android 6. Radio stations are always backed up to your Google account and will be restored at reinstall.On devices running on older versions of Android you must manually save and restore the "/Android/data/{{Application-Name}}/files/Collection" folder and "//data/data/{{Application-Name}}/databases/" folder.
Why are there no settings in Open Quran Radio?
There is nothing to set ;). Open Quran Radio is a very simple app.Depending on your point of view "simple" is either great or lame.
برنامج مجاني , يحتوي علي قنوات راديو لأشهر قراء القرآن الكريم , كل القنوات تحتاج الي انترنت مستمر للتشغيل.
هذه الإصدار يحتوي علي حوالي 26 قناة , سنحاول في الإصدارات القادمة إضافة مجموعة من أشهر القراء.
